subject: little pink tablets of generic benadryl
body:
1\. little pink tablets of generic benadryl, the most important drug for this time of the year. also, thinking i was out of weed (second most important drug) and not wanting to have to go to the dispensary that is all of three blocks away (taylor swift voice CHAMPAGNE PROBLEMS) but then finding another container with weed in it.

2\. [ebay listing for four giant cheez-its stuck together](https://www.ebay.com/itm/134148856933) that e sent me when we were discussing rare snack foods, also while researching the possible discontinuation of tapatio doritos (the current gold standard dorito flavor) finding the site [discontinuednews.com](http://discontinuednews.com) which has amazingly thorough chum articles like [this](https://discontinuednews.com/tapatio-doritos-discontinued/). the first of the grapefruit popsicles that deborah has made this summer. the last honey mango in the fridge, which was the sweetest of all.

3\. the song "[atomic](https://open.spotify.com/track/5kBBVaQUEisiw5AHIGbRn4)" by aziya, which is a perfect short blast of summer rock and kind of reminds me of the summer when i lived in korea and listening to "[lights out](https://open.spotify.com/track/4yK3xXuNrkSq0OVjKUaCkY?si=65ffa7a388eb40b8)" and "[l.e.s artistes](https://open.spotify.com/track/4dmCLAZbWYT0qtcG7GVMdb?si=7204a12c58dc47c7)" all the time.

2\. [ebay listing for four giant cheez-its stuck together](https://www.ebay.com/itm/134148856933) that e sent me when we were discussing rare snack foods, also while researching the possible discontinuation of tapatio doritos (the current gold standard dorito flavor) finding the site [discontinuednews.com](http://discontinuednews.com) which has amazingly thorough chum articles like [this](https://discontinuednews.com/tapatio-doritos-discontinued/). the first of the grapefruit popsicles that deborah has made this summer. the last honey mango in the fridge, which was the sweetest of all.

3\. the song "[atomic](https://open.spotify.com/track/5kBBVaQUEisiw5AHIGbRn4)" by aziya, which is a perfect short blast of summer rock and kind of reminds me of the summer when i lived in korea and listening to "[lights out](https://open.spotify.com/track/4yK3xXuNrkSq0OVjKUaCkY?si=65ffa7a388eb40b8)" and "[l.e.s artistes](https://open.spotify.com/track/4dmCLAZbWYT0qtcG7GVMdb?si=7204a12c58dc47c7)" all the time.
